venue.address_2: Just off of Boylston St between Charles + Tremont, 1/2 block from Boylston T-stop, its inside 'the alley'
venue.name: The Estate

item.description:
Join for some Valentines themed fun for singles- FLIRT FEST 2010-The sexiest alternative to Valentine's Day.

All guests enjoy:

* Cocktail reception and complimentary hors d'oeuvres from 8:30 - 9:30pm
* DJ spinning to get you on the dance floor all night long
* Best & worst pick up line contest for 2010
* Crowning of Boston's biggest flirts for 2010

Please call my cell at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding our group! Look forward to seeing you!

Tickets are $20, must be purchased in advance (the event sells out)and can be purchased using this link. Not only are you buying a ticket to a cool event, but when you use this link, a portion of the ticket proceeds will be donated to Project Smile, the non profit organization!

Ticket link: http://www.bostoneven...

There is currently a two ticket for $20 promo, so get your tickets now!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near ticket area- please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Join Us for Flirt Fest Boston's Biggest Anti-Valentine's Day Bash
